hints.content:
168: :label: rem-prerequisite-drifts
169: 
170: The following drift inequalities are established in the prerequisite documents and used throughout:
171: 
172: | Component          | Cloning Drift (03_cloning.md)           | Kinetic Drift (05_kinetic_contraction.md)                   |
173: |:-------------------|:----------------------------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------|
174: | $V_W$              | $\leq C_W$                              | $\leq -\kappa_W V_W \tau + C_W'\tau$                        |
175: | $V_{\text{Var},x}$ | $\leq -\kappa_x V_{\text{Var},x} + C_x$ | $\leq C_{\text{kin},x}\tau$                                 |
176: | $V_{\text{Var},v}$ | $\leq C_v$                              | $\leq -2\gamma V_{\text{Var},v}\tau + d\sigma_{\max}^2\tau$ |
177: | $W_b$              | $\leq -\kappa_b W_b + C_b$              | $\leq -\kappa_{\text{pot}} W_b \tau + C_{\text{pot}}\tau$   |
